titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation touching manners, sea-men, and souldiers, which are to serve in His Majesties navy
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the 23rd day of November, 1664, in the 16th year of His Majesties reign."
